name: ANS | [TECH] - Re-use of storage area
description: The provider must ensure that in the event of the re-use of storage space, the latter has first been purged and that no old data can be accessed.
testingInformation: Storage space are properly sanitized before being re-used
actionPlanInstructions:
1. Use storage space provided by AWS that present the HDS certification.
2. When working directly with EBS volume, release and re-provision the space will ensure that no data are incorrectly transfered to the new storage space.
actionPlanTitle: Storage space not properly sanitized when being re-used
